text: Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 18. Should any bhikkhunī, because of a misapprehension, because of a misunderstanding, malign another (bhikkhunī), it is to be confessed.
